segments.text: I notice the boy on the stool reaching for the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He’s going to fall if he stretches any further.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks like it’s about to tip over.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, waiting for a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She doesn’t seem worried at all.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think they’re both going to end up on the wet floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is still drying dishes, completely oblivious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she’ll even notice if they fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is still pouring out of the sink, and she doesn’t care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is such a chaotic kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel bad for whoever has to clean this up.
segments.speaker: PAR
